service.name: recordsupdated.csv
service.documentation:
CSV service for records updated during a period report.
Parameters: * dateFrom: begin date (yyyy-mm-dd) to filter the metadata change date. * dateTo: end date (yyyy-mm-dd) to filter the metadata change date. * groups (optional): list of groups identifiers (metadata group owner).
